name: 3D Pong
description:
A 3D Pong clone made in Godot for GitHub GameOff 2017.

Press F11 to enter fullscreen.

(Mouse capture is broken in the HTML5 version.)

(Linux builds are untested. You will probably have to chmod +x the executable before running it.)

Version 1.1 changes:

- improved joystick deadzone handling.

- added screenshot hotkey (F2).
